overview: Veronica decides to cut gym class because she isn't as athletic as the other girls, but coach Ferrara feels otherwise.  Bright student Molly has the hots for her teacher but doesn't know how to tell him, so she decides to cause a little trouble to get Prof. Everhard's full attention.  Nobody respects teachers aid Casey, but when Prof Stone returns he gives her all the respect she deserves.  Principle Gunn receives tons of complaints about Kelly pissing off staff members, so he springs into action to discipline her.
title: Corrupt Schoolgirls 4
